channel.title: [Suggestion] The new Allies! For king
channel.description:
Hi! Here is my Allies rework for king, hope you like it!
Allies! Night ability for king, **infinite/4 uses (needs to be checked)**, all kings has this ability
Scout 2 players, if they are of the same faction, you got no information. If they are from different factions, you get the confirmed faction of 1 of them, you dont know which one is it.
Not that much to say, this can fix the SuperSherrifPally King meta.
Have a nice day!
